Keywords: Fantastic Four , Monster
Real Name: Bruce Banner
Special Powers
A NEW KIND OF FANTASTIC TEAMWORK: When Hulk hits with a close attack, until your next turn other friendly characters with the Fantastic Four keyword can use Charge.
THE NEW FANTASTIC FOUR: Passenger: 1, but only to carry characters with the Fantastic Four keyword. // Once per turn, when Hulk is carried and placed adjacent to 2+ opposing characters, after resolutions he may make a close attack.
GUESS I'LL SMASH...: Charge, but does not halve speed.
Trade Hulk Want Hulk

Comments
February 19, 2021
Goop
There is a good amount of FF pieces that are missing move and attack. The trait that this hulk has can be a MASSIVE benefit to those figures. By himself he's ok for 75 points but giving that extra mobility to your entire FF team can be a game changer. I also really like his ability to do a full charge with a carry. Combos well with SR Wolverine.
October 13, 2020
PDiddyKong
This Hulk winds me up every time I play him.. only 3 clicks of Super Strength and really poor defence stats and powers?

Defenders keyword wouldn’t make sense for this one. That said, I’ll give you all the others ones. Don’t understand why so few have the Defenders keyword.
